name: Louiza Labs
long_description:
Louiza Labs accurately simulates human biology so medical technology (devices, robots, etc) can be trained and tested without real patients or hard to access real-world medical data.

Our physics-driven AI engine creates hyper-accurate, multi-organ human models with unprecedented speed and fidelity.

Instead of spending millions on data for clinical trials, cadaver labs, or risky human testing—use Louiza to:
1. Test devices on digital twins—faster FDA, no animal trials.
2. Generate rare, high-fidelity edge-case datasets.
3. Train AI for combat, triage, and robotic procedures in extreme conditions.
4. Simulate stressed anatomy (e.g., Bruno Fernandes under fatigue, fighter pilots under G-force).

Bonus: Our anatomically accurate models are indistinguishable from real humans and can be “imaged” (e.g., X-ray, ultrasound) for use in ML pipelines.
one_liner: Simulated human biology and synthetic medical datasets.
